account-key-filter.help: Account key filter, using the UPN as the search filter.
account-key-filter.name: account-key-filter

account-key-processing.help: Account key processing operation, either keep or strip domain string of UPN in the token.
account-key-processing.name: account-key-processing

cnid.help: Common name identifier for the LDAP server. The common name identifier for most LDAP servers is "cn".
cnid.name: cnid

dn.help: Distinguished name used to look up entries on the LDAP server.
dn.name: dn

group-search-base.help: Search base used for group searching.
group-search-base.name: group-search-base

interface.help: Specify outgoing interface to reach server.
interface.name: interface

interface-select-method.help: Specify how to select outgoing interface to reach server.
interface-select-method.name: interface-select-method

options.help: Set outgoing interface by SD-WAN or policy routing rules.
options.name: sdwan

member-attr.help: Name of attribute from which to get group membership.
member-attr.name: member-attr

port.help: Port to be used for communication with the LDAP server (default = 389).
port.name: port

options.help: Recursively retrieve the user-group chain information of a user in a particular Microsoft AD domain.
options.name: recursive

secondary-server.help: Secondary LDAP server CN domain name or IP.
secondary-server.name: secondary-server

secure.help: Port to be used for authentication.
secure.name: secure

server.help: LDAP server CN domain name or IP.
server.name: server

server-identity-check.help: Enable/disable LDAP server identity check (verify server domain name/IP address against the server certificate).
server-identity-check.name: server-identity-check

source-ip.help: Source IP for communications to LDAP server.
source-ip.name: source-ip

ssl-min-proto-version.help: Minimum supported protocol version for SSL/TLS connections (default is to follow system global setting).
ssl-min-proto-version.name: ssl-min-proto-version

tertiary-server.help: Tertiary LDAP server CN domain name or IP.
tertiary-server.name: tertiary-server

two-factor-notification.help: Notification method for user activation by FortiToken Cloud.
two-factor-notification.name: two-factor-notification

options.help: Bind using username/password and then search.
options.name: regular

user-info-exchange-server.help: MS Exchange server from which to fetch user information.
user-info-exchange-server.name: user-info-exchange-server
